text: Brown Line may refer to: * Brown Line (CTA), Chicago * Brown Line (Pittsburgh), Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania * BMT Nassau Street Line, a rapid transit line in New York City, serving the J Z Trains * Wenhu line, Taipei, Taiwan * Ma On Shan Line (future would be East West Corridor), Hong Kong, China * Brown Line (Delhi Metro), Delhi, India * Brown line, a process defined as siderotype, a monochrome printing process
title: Brown Line
